description: Team-level game statistics and rankings for NBA regular season and playoff games from 2010-2024

foreign_keys.GAME_ID: References unique game identifier (matches gameId in box_scores)
foreign_keys.TEAM_ID: References team identifier (matches teamId in box_scores)

columns.name: SEASON_YEAR
columns.description: The NBA season year

columns.name: TEAM_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the NBA team

columns.name: TEAM_ABBREVIATION
columns.description: Three-letter team abbreviation

columns.name: TEAM_NAME
columns.description: Full official team name

columns.name: GAME_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each NBA game

columns.name: GAME_DATE
columns.description: Date and time when the game was played

columns.name: MATCHUP
columns.description: Team matchup showing team @ opponent or team vs opponent
columns.validation: Format: TEAM @ TEAM or TEAM vs TEAM

columns.name: WL
columns.description: Game outcome: W for Win, L for Loss

columns.name: MIN
columns.description: Total team minutes played (usually 240.0 for regulation games)

columns.name: FGM
columns.description: Total field goals made by the team

columns.name: FGA
columns.description: Total field goal attempts by the team

columns.name: FG_PCT
columns.description: Team field goal shooting percentage

columns.name: FG3M
columns.description: Total three-point field goals made by the team

columns.name: FG3A
columns.description: Total three-point attempts by the team

columns.name: FG3_PCT
columns.description: Team three-point shooting percentage

columns.name: FTM
columns.description: Total free throws made by the team

columns.name: FTA
columns.description: Total free throw attempts by the team

columns.name: FT_PCT
columns.description: Team free throw shooting percentage

columns.name: OREB
columns.description: Total offensive rebounds by the team

columns.name: DREB
columns.description: Total defensive rebounds by the team

columns.name: REB
columns.description: Total rebounds by the team (OREB + DREB)

columns.name: AST
columns.description: Total assists by the team

columns.name: TOV
columns.description: Total turnovers by the team

columns.name: STL
columns.description: Total steals by the team

columns.name: BLK
columns.description: Total blocks by the team

columns.name: BLKA
columns.description: Total opponent blocks (shots blocked by opponents)

columns.name: PF
columns.description: Total personal fouls committed by the team

columns.name: PFD
columns.description: Total personal fouls drawn by the team

columns.name: PTS
columns.description: Total points scored by the team
columns.validation: Non-negative integer, calculated from made shots

columns.name: PLUS_MINUS
columns.description: Team's point differential (points scored - points allowed)
columns.validation: Can be negative, positive indicates team outscored opponent

columns.name: GP_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on games played

columns.name: W_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on total wins

columns.name: L_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on total losses

columns.name: W_PCT_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on win percentage

columns.name: MIN_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on total minutes played

columns.name: FGM_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on field goals made

columns.name: FGA_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on field goal attempts

columns.name: FG_PCT_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on field goal percentage

columns.name: FG3M_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on three-point field goals made

columns.name: FG3A_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on three-point attempts

columns.name: FG3_PCT_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on three-point percentage

columns.name: FTM_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on free throws made

columns.name: FTA_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on free throw attempts

columns.name: FT_PCT_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on free throw percentage

columns.name: OREB_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on offensive rebounds

columns.name: DREB_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on defensive rebounds

columns.name: REB_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on total rebounds

columns.name: AST_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on assists

columns.name: TOV_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on turnovers

columns.name: STL_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on steals

columns.name: BLK_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on blocks

columns.name: BLKA_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on opponent blocks

columns.name: PF_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on personal fouls committed

columns.name: PFD_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on personal fouls drawn

columns.name: PTS_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on total points scored

columns.name: PLUS_MINUS_RANK
columns.description: Team's rank based on plus-minus differential

columns.name: AVAILABLE_FLAG
columns.description: Flag indicating data availability (1.0 = available, 0.0 = not available)

to_box_scores.description: Team totals are aggregations of individual player box scores for the same game and team

business_rules: Each game has exactly two team total records (one for each team)
Total points calculation: (FGM - FG3M) * 2 + FG3M * 3 + FTM
Total rebounds must equal offensive rebounds + defensive rebounds
Three-point statistics are subset of field goal statistics
PLUS_MINUS represents point differential (team points - opponent points)
Ranking fields represent cumulative season rankings at time of game
AVAILABLE_FLAG indicates whether complete statistical data is available

for_ai_agents: Use GAME_ID to join with box_scores for detailed player breakdowns
WL field provides immediate game outcome without calculation
Ranking fields show historical team performance context
PLUS_MINUS directly shows margin of victory/defeat
Filter by AVAILABLE_FLAG=1.0 for complete statistical records
common_analyses: Team performance trends: win percentage, scoring efficiency over time
League rankings: team standings and statistical rankings
Game outcome prediction: using historical performance metrics
Correlation analysis: relationship between different statistical categories and wins
ranking_interpretation: Lower rank numbers typically indicate better performance (e.g., W_RANK=1 means most wins)
Ranking values can exceed 30 due to historical accumulation across seasons
Rankings provide context for team performance relative to league
Some rankings may be inverse (higher rank = worse performance for negative stats like turnovers)
